sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
  div(:style="{'background-color':color.bgc, height: '100%'}")

    h1 補休時數累計
    div
      table.myTable
        tr
          th 編號    
          th 日期
          th 時間
          th 時數
          th 事件
        tr(v-for='(record,index) in recordData' :key='index')
          td {{index+1}}
          td.myTd {{record.date}}
          td.myTd {{record.from}}-{{record.to}}
          td.myTd {{record.total}}
          td.myTd(:class="record.event=='加班'? 'textGreen':'textRed'") {{record.event}}

    div(class="myLabel")
        h3 合計：03 天 7 小時 0 分鐘

    .recButton(:style="{'background-color':color.but}")
        router-link(to='/leave/Picker' :style="{color: '#FFF'}") 放假囉 !
         
</template>

<script>
export default {
    data(){
        return{
            recordData: [
            {
                date: "2019-06-30",
                from: "17:30",
                to: "18:30",
                total: "60分鐘",
                event:"加班"
            },
            {
                date: "2019-06-30",
                from: "09:30",
                to: "18:30",
                total: "1天",
                event:"補休"
            },
            {
                date: "2019-07-05~2019-07-07",
                from: "09:30",
                to: "18:30",
                total: "3天",
                event:"特休"
            }
            ],
            color: {
            but: "#333333",
            bgc: "#A78E70"
            }
        }
    }
}
</script>

<style lang="sass">
h1,p 
    color: #FFF
    margin: 20px

.textRed
    color: #7E3535
.textGreen
    color: #2D533B

.recButton
  border: none
  padding: 25px
  font-size: 20px
  width: 200px
  border-radius: 5%
  line-height: 30px
  margin: 0 auto
  transition: 0.6s
  position: relative
  top: 10%
  cursor: pointer

.recButton:hover 
  box-shadow: 2px 2px 2px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.6), 4px 4px 6px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.4), 6px 6px 12px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.4)

.myLabel
    position: relative
    top: 9%
    border-style: solid
    border-width: 1px
    border-color: #FFF
    width: 20%
    margin: 0 auto
    padding: 5px
    color: #FFF

</style>
